FuncDef: The accounting-scheme command applies an accounting scheme to a domain. The undo accounting-scheme command restores the default accounting scheme of a domain. By default, the accounting scheme named default is applied to a domain. In this default accounting scheme, non-accounting is used and the real-time accounting function is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an accounting scheme.
The accounting scheme must already exist.

ExtraInfo: To charge users in a domain, create an accounting scheme and perform configurations in the accounting scheme, for example, set the accounting mode and policy for accounting-start failures. Run the accounting-scheme command in the AAA domain view to apply the accounting scheme to the domain.
